[[inst_v_shfl_idx]]
==== V.SHFL.IDX

*Syntax:* v.shfl.idx SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T>, SrcP.<T>, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (indexed): permutes vector elements using immediate indices.
